Text: UPDATE 1-Sweden's Kinnevik to hand out Millicom stake to shareholders 2 Min Read (Adds detail, background, shares) STOCKHOLM, Sept 17 (Reuters) - Investment company Kinnevik will hand out its 37.2% stake in telecoms operator Millicom to shareholders as it presses on with its strategy to increase its exposure to private Nordic companies.
Cause: it presses on with its strategy to increase its exposure to private Nordic companies.
Effect: Investment company Kinnevik will hand out its 37.2% stake in telecoms operator Millicom to shareholders
Sentence: UPDATE 1-Sweden's Kinnevik to hand out Millicom stake to shareholders 2 Min Read (Adds detail, background, shares) STOCKHOLM, Sept 17 (Reuters) - <e2>Investment company Kinnevik will hand out its 37.2% stake in telecoms operator Millicom to shareholders</e2> as <e1>it presses on with its strategy to increase its exposure to private Nordic companies.</e1>
